DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare influence two different energy density photobiomodulation recovery palatal donor area free gingival graft technique .
DOC.brief_title: Photobiomodulation Palatal Donor Site After Free Gingival Graft Removal
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , parallel control clinical trial . The population evaluate study select Science Technology Institute ( STI ) -São José do Campos , College Dentistry . Patients assign one three treatment group : - Group 1 : ridge preservation surgery free gingival graft photobiomodulation ( PBM ) application gallium aluminum arsenide laser ( GaAlAs ) donor area use 60 Joule/cm² dose - Group 2 : ridge preservation surgery free gingival graft PBM gallium aluminum arsenide laser ( GaAlAs ) donor area use 15 Joule/cm² dose - Group 3 : ridge preservation surgery free gingival graft PBM Sham . All surgery perform expert periodontist ( MPS ) . A blade 15c ( Swann-Morton® - Sheffield , England ) mount No . 3 scalpel handle make intrasulcular incision around tooth indicate exodontia . Then , tooth extract use appropriate instrument order obtain minimally traumatic exodontia . After exodontia , curettage irrigation dental socket perform . After , socket fill xenogenous bone graft ( GenOx Inorg ; Campinas , SP ) , seal free gingival graft remove palate . For free gingival graft removal , circular template 5 millimeter diameter use . This mold objective standardizing palatal graft removal ensure wound always size . After circular incision , graft remove thickness 2 millimeter . After free gingival graft removal palate , adjust entrance socket suture Vicryl® 5.0 reabsorbable ( Ethicon Johnsons Brasil , São José do Campos - SP ) . The evaluated parameter wound remain area ( WRA ) , scar tissue colorimetry ( TC ) , tissue thickness ( TT ) postoperative discomfort ( D ) , evaluate baseline 7 , 14 , 45 , 60 , 90 day surgery . Statistical Analysis : All data express mean ± standard deviation express percentage descriptive phase . Data analyze accord distribution Shapiro-Wilk test . For remain wound area , tissue colorimetry , tissue thickness , postoperative discomfort parameter analysis , two way repeat measure ANOVA perform intra- intergroup analysis . T test use intergroup comparison number analgesic take . The presence absence scar measure Q-square test . Statistical analysis perform use Sigma Plot 12.0 . In test significance level 0.05 chosen .
DOC.criteria: Patients present indication anterior maxillary exodontia ( 15 25 ) , normal gingival contour teeth indicate exodontia ; The tooth include study , well adjacent teeth present loss periodontal insertion . Patients agree sign formal consent participate study receive explanation risk benefit individual member present study ( Resolution . 196 October , 1996 , Ethics Code Professional Conduct Dentistry 179/93 ) . Were exclude patient systemic problem contraindicate surgical procedure Those medication could interfere wound heal Those smoke Those pregnant lactating , Those periodontal surgery study area .
